Data Overview: General information about the dataset, such as the source and purpose of the data.


Variable Descriptions: Definitions for each variable or column in the dataset, including units and data types.

Missing Data Handling: Explanation of how missing values were handled in the dataset.

Data Processing: Steps or code used to clean, transform, or manipulate the data.

Code Instructions: Information on how to run the script and use the dataset.

Analysis Description: Details of the analyses performed or planned.
